name: At the Heart of a European Forest!
description:
Ardennes
is a beautiful and inspiring forest that is primarily in Belgium and
Luxembourg, but also stretching into France and Germany. The forest
is very vast, so this trip will primarily be set in the municipality
of Durbuy and La Roche-en-Ardennes. This place is like heaven and
perfect for many occasions. The mountains are beautiful. The locals
speak French, so for most Europeans, it is a unique culture. Ardennes
is a natural wonder. Fall is the most stunning time of the year
because of all the colours of the leaves. It is also the wild season
because it is easy to spot various animals. If you are not European,
then the nature is quite unusual, so it is the perfect place for you.
However, if you come from Canada or the United States, then you will
be more tempted by the cultural aspects of Durbuy and La
Roche-en-Ardennes. The food is of course delicious, and the beer,
Belgian. How long you stay depends on how far you've come. If you had
a long trip, it is best to spend the night. Many people have a full
vacation here. Some people even have a summer house in Ardennes.
